attributes.action: Ask HM Government to reject the call for a second EU Referendum
attributes.additional_details:
On the 23rd of June 2016, the UK went to the polls to ask the most important question in a lifetime - should the UK leave or remain in the EU. 

The result which came from this, was that we leave.  That is the will of the people and the Prime Minister has made it quite clear that the will of the people is to be respected.

Others are trying now to call for a 2nd referendum, to send us back to the polls.  This is not the right way to disagree with the result.
attributes.background: Having recently undergone a long period of campaigning in the UK, to decide whether or not we should exit or remain in the European Union, the people of this nation have voted to leave the EU.  Others are trying to instigate a second referendum, disregarding the will of the people.
